meanings.definition: Opposed to or designed to counteract ships.
meanings.sent1: The navy developed new antiship missiles to protect their fleet.
meanings.sent2: The antiship defense system was crucial in safeguarding the harbor.
meanings.sent3: The antiship paint on the boat made it invisible to enemy radars.
meanings.sent4: Her sharp wit was like an antiship weapon against his arguments.
meanings.sent5: The antiship strategy proved effective in repelling the enemy invasion.

meanings.definition: A weapon or system designed to target and destroy ships.
meanings.sent1: The military deployed antiship missiles to sink enemy vessels.
meanings.sent2: The new antiship technology revolutionized naval warfare.
meanings.sent3: The antiship cannon fired with precision, hitting the enemy ship.
meanings.sent4: The captain relied on the antiship torpedoes to defend the fleet.
meanings.sent5: The powerful antiship weapon struck fear into the hearts of sailors.
